title: Formula for an Infinite Geometric Series
text: For an infinite geometric series whose first term is $$a_1$$ and common ratio $$r$$, if |r|<1, then the sum is $$S=\frac{a_1}{1-r}$$. If |r|>1, then the infinite geometric series does not have a sum and diverges.
